mase¶

hydrostats.metrics.mase(simulated_array, observed_array, m=1, replace_nan=None, replace_inf=None, remove_neg=False, remove_zero=False)[source]¶

Returns the Mean Absolute Scaled Error, the default period for m (seasonal period) is 1. Using the default assumes that the data is non-seasonal arguments: simulated array, observed array, m where m is the seasonal period

Previous topic

rmsle

Next topic

r_squared
